text: hi how are you
I'm well, thanks
do you know how is the save the children
I've heard of it.  It's a charity, right?   What do they do?
yes it is a organization do you know more info
I'd like more information, yes.

The Save the Children Fund, commonly known as Save the Children, is an international non-governmental organisation that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
That's nice.  What kind of things do they help with?
yes do you donate money for this kids
I could probably donate a small amount.  I'm kinda broke at the moment, though.
to help some of the kids is the biggest sadisfaxion you took in life
I agree it's for a good cause.  I'd be willing to donate $.05.   How do I do that?
there are many children who suffer today in the world for bread
that's very sad.  Every child deserves to have nutritious food.
every parent and I and my family donate $ 100 for the children in need
Wow, that's very generous.  I hope to be able to do that someday.
it is the best satisfaction entire of my life
That's wonderful.  How often are you able to do that?  How can I donate?
5 ARE GOOD you help any children
I'm not sure I understand what you said just now.   How can I donate?
